channel.title: Crypto on N9O
channel.description: Recent content in Crypto on N9O

item.title: Apes and Kittens in the Music Industry
item.description: Technology has disrupted the music industry several times in history, changing the way we consume it, how it’s distributed and even how it’s made. In this article we’ll reflect about the good, the bad, and the ugly facts around NFTs in the music industry.
